attributes.additional_details:
We England fans are watching the slow demise of English cricket due to some extraordinary selections but the ECB team selectors.

We are campaigning to remove the selectors who repeatedly pick Jade Dernbach for the side although he has no clue how to bowl, in turn reflecting the selectors inability to spot a duff'un.

KEEP ENGLISH CRICKET GOING FORWARD - DROP DERNBACH AND REMOVE THE INCOMPETENT SELECTORS AT THE ECB.
